#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
long long res[200000];
int main()
{
    long long int t,n,i,x;
    vector<long long> v;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n;
        for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
        {
            cin>>x;
            v.push_back(x);
        }
        sort(v.begin(),v.end());
        for(i=1;i<n;i+=2)
        {
            if(i+1<n)
                swap(v[i],v[i+1]);
        }
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            cout<<v[i]<<" ";
        }
        cout<<"\n";
        v.clear();
    }
    return 0;
}
